testcase.classname: To test the Search feature of Wikipedia
testcase.name: Check the Functionality of Search
testcase.system-out: Given User opens browser and launches Wikipedia url.........................passed When User is on Wikipedia Page and checks the Title.........................passed Then Searches for "furry rabbits"...........................................passed Then Checks that 'did you mean' suggestion appears..........................passed Then Checks that 20 search results appears..................................passed Then Checks the first search result and its details.........................passed And Closes the Browser......................................................passed

testcase.classname: To test the slider feature of Travelx
testcase.name: Check the Functionality of Slider for some elements
testcase.system-out: Given User opens browser and launches Travelex url..........................passed Then User resizes the window to 550px.......................................passed Then User swipes left on the slider.........................................passed Then User swipes left again.................................................passed Then User validates that the item displayed is indeed the third item........passed And Closes the Travelex Browser.............................................passed
